author: Zoe Schiffer
title: The jury is still out on Zoom trials
description: As people around the country stay indoors to help curb the spread of COVID-19, court hearings are happening on Zoom. Critics worry this is eroding transparency in the justice system.
content: It would have been an uneventful court appearance had one of the lawyers not had some trouble with his Zoom background. Alan Rupe, an employment lawyer at Lewis Brisbois, popped into the videoconference framed by majestic sunbeams. I apologize for the backgro… [+6358 chars]
